title: Pediatrician molests dozens of young patients; Teen kills himself after his teacher sexually abuses him
itunes:title: Pediatrician molests dozens of young patients; Teen kills himself after his teacher sexually abuses him
description:
A Pennsylvania pediatrician convicted of sexually assaulting young patients will likely spend the rest of his life in prison after a judge sentenced him to at least 79 years. Prosecutors say Dr. Johnnie Barto, 71, spent decades abusing children in the exam room at his pediatric practice and at local hospitals. Nancy Grace discusses the case with experts including North Carolina family & divorce lawyer Kathleen Murphy, Atlanta psychologist Dr. Wendy Dickinson, former detective Steven Lampley, and Crime Stories reporter Robyn Walensky. Nancy also looks at the case of a teen who committed suicide after sexual abuse by his high school teacher. Atlanta juvenile judge and lawyer Ashley Willcott and Crime Stories reporter Nicole Partin join the panel for this segment.
